or animals, municipal waste and
agricultural waste, saf emits

Korea and Italy to win the right to host the
exhibition.  World Expo 2030
is an event that takes place every 5 years, attracting
millions of visitors and
billions of dollars in
investment capital right in the first vote of the
International Exhibition Office.
won 119 votes in favor while
the city of Busan in Korea and Rome in

Fahan An Saud welcomed the election results and
appreciated the trust of
international community towards the commitments of
this Middle Eastern country. He also
said that World Expo 2030 takes place at the same
time as the country launches the
Vision 2030 program to strive to reform and
develop the country to reduce dependence.
World Expo is held every 5 years
and lasts a maximum of 6 months.
This is an opportunity for the host country to
promote scientific and architectural achievements
while attracting international tourists
at this time.  Recently organized World Expo 2020
Dubai welcomed about 24 million visitors
to visit the next World Expo in
2025 will be held in Osaka Japan

This year's Christmas season conveys the

International Paralympic Committee and Chairman of the
Paris Olympic Organizing Committee and a large number of
people from the city hall.  Paris itself will

end of the 2024 Paris Olympics, on
September 8 next year. It is expected that the city will
welcome about 10 million visitors

The People's Court of
Ho Chi Minh City has opened a
trial for Nguyen Minh Quan, director of Thu Duc
City Hospital, and eight
accomplices related to bidding violations that
occurred at Thu Duc City Hospital, causing
damage.  more than 103 billion
VND according to the indictment from 2016 to
2020, Thu Duc city hospital has
bid for 31 medical equipment procurement packages, of
which 28 packages have been
approved with winning and completed results.
Payment with a total amount of more than
346 billion VND, Defendant Quan directed
Defendant Nguyen Van Loi, director of
Nguyen Tam company, to establish backyard companies
to sign contracts to buy and sell around the world
to raise the price of medical machinery and equipment.  Later,
participating in bidding for Thu Duc Quan city hospital
was determined to have directed and
pressured government officials to
collude with the defendants to complete and complete
documents to officially sign the bid documents to press the contract.
assigned to the military's backyard companies
27 bidding packages at increased prices, preventing appropriation of a
total amount of more than 103 billion VND.
Nguyen Minh Quan and Nguyen Van Loi were
prosecuted for two counts of property embezzlement
and money laundering.  The remaining defendant is being
tried for violating bidding regulations
causing serious consequences. The trial is expected to
last 3
days. Thu Duc city police in
Ho Chi Minh City are temporarily detaining a group of four
subjects for investigation.  Regarding the act of making
fake documents, the arrested subjects include
Nguyen Toan Trung, Nguyen Manh Liem Vu
Anh Nghiep and martial artist Phung, in which Trung

document seals of the organization that has just
accepted them.  After serving the sentence, he continued to
commit
crimes. After a period of monitoring and collecting
evidence, the police caught the monk
delivering fake documents to customers to
expand the investigation. The police searched the place where
the subjects rented them to work.
Here, the authorities confiscated nearly
300 types of documents suspected of being fake, such as
robbing citizens of driver's licenses,
master's degrees, university graduates,
professional certifications, and many machines and
equipment.  Confirmed through the
application that the subject of Hung's love group was
unclear as to the delivery schedule of
the documents with signatures and signatures of Red Trung
and Liem Sinh, who collected customer information,
edited it and then printed it out in the finished product.
The business is responsible for delivering to
customers all kinds of fake documents and certificates
sold at prices ranging from 1.5 million VND
to 2.5 million VND. On average, each
month, counterfeiters sell and sell
about 300 million VND.
